Author: leff
Comment: i gave up twitter some time last year. the only reason I ever miss it is when a friend who is \_only\_ on twitter says something I want to reply to. My set of ‘twitter only’ friends is, happily, dwindling.

Author: Phil
Comment: Yeah I remember you saying that it was the worst platform for conversations and that you’d be on Facebook if anyone needed you. I still hate facebook too much to switch to that though, so it pretty much looks like I’m opting out of micro-blogging altogether.

Author: Pete Prodoehl
Comment: Invest in blogging…. it’s the future! (And probably more future-proof than other platforms.)

Author: Phil
Comment:
Can’t disagree with that. FWIW I ended up hacking the scuttle core so that scuttle is my primary bookmarking tool and posts to delicious in the background. I need to sort out my Twitter backups/secondary posting, and I have no idea what to do with Facebook. It’s where the family is and hence is a small silo of data.

I should blog more.

Author: Pete Prodoehl
Comment: Phil, yes… blog more. Interested in your Scuttle hacks as well.
